attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Orang-utans have lost 90percent of there population over the past 100 years! Millions of products use palm oil (palm oil is the reason why orang-utans are facing extinction.)There are some people who are trying to help such as WWF (world wildlife fund). these people are helping cos they care, and if you cared then why dont you do something to help?

rejection.details:
The title does not reflect the point of the petition and is simialr to the existing petition:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/orangutans/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
